email_text:
Subject: Your Spotify Premium Subscription Renewal Confirmation

Dear [Customer Name],

We hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to inform you that your Spotify Premium subscription has been successfully renewed for another month.

Billing Details:
Subscription Type: Spotify Premium
Subscription Plan: Monthly
Renewal Date: [Renewal Date]
Billing Amount: $9.99

Payment Method: [Payment Method]
Billing Address: [Billing Address]

If you have any questions or concerns regarding your subscription or billing details, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team. We are here to assist you in any way we can.

Thank you for being a valued member of the Spotify community. We appreciate your continued support.

Warm regards,

The Spotify Team
